data.title: parallel corpora of more than 1500+ unique languages for NLP research
data.meta_description: Creating super-parallel corpora of more than 1500+ unique languages for NLP research - ehsanasgari/1000Langs
data.text:
Developer and maintainer: Ehsaneddin Asgari (asgari [at] cis [dot] lmu [dot] de)

Please feel free to report any technical issue by sending an email or reporting an issue here.

PI: Prof. Hinrich Schuetze

The 1000Langs is written in Python3. For the detailed installation and running guideline see the installation guideline .

The 1000Langs super-parallel crawler currently supports crawling of 1500+ unique languages, that are crawled through multiple sources of bible corpora. Here you can find the list of languages covered by 1000Langs crawler to date (Dec 2018). These language are subject to change based on changes in the crawling sources.
